## ErrorMessagesExtractor.getErrors() method

Gets validation errors result for provided control, or null of no errors are present

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getErrors(control: FormControl, messages?: StringDictionary): ValidationErrorsResult;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  control | FormControl | Form control instance that should be inspected for errors |
|  messages | StringDictionary | Object containing error messages that should patch existing error messages |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ValidationErrorsResult](./common-forms.validationerrorsresult.md)
